body_html:
This is expected.
Cuda8 still does not have APT packages we can install.
APT packages deploy all cuda libraries/headers to different locations than nvidia's installer.
Thus our cuda7.5 images wont work out of the box with cuda 8 images.

@flx42, could you verify the above information?

body:
This is expected.
Cuda8 still does not have APT packages we can install.
APT packages deploy all cuda libraries/headers to different locations than nvidia's installer.
Thus our cuda7.5 images wont work out of the box with cuda 8 images.

@flx42, could you verify the above information?
